title: You can get paid £780 to watch Disney movies every day for a month
text:

Five of the 'biggest, baddest Disney fans out there' are being offered the job opportunity of a lifetime - being paid to watch 30 Disney films or shows in 30 days.

Ahead of the launch of the Disney+ streaming service , Reviews.org is on the lookout for hardcore fans to help them celebrate.

There's no need to rub a magic lamp or go on a life-altering journey to find yourself (or Nemo), all you have to do is submit a simple application.

It goes without saying that only the most ardent fans need apply, so if you can belt out every word to Let It Go and and name all 101 Dalmatians (just kidding) then this might just be your dream job.

(Image: Disney)

The successful super-fans will be able to pick 30 of their favourite Disney films or TV shows and watch one each day for an entire month.

In return you'll be given about £780 and a Disney-themed movie-watching kit complete with cozy mouse-themed blanket, four cups 'that would make Mickey proud' and a Pixar popcorn popper with plenty of popcorn kernels to keep you going.

Oh, and you also get a year-long subscription to Disney+ to keep feeding your Disney addiction.

(Image: Handout)

All you need to do is complete a few simple questions and send off a video review of your favourite Disney film. You can apply for the role here .

The bad news for us Brits is that you have to be a US citizen to take part. No fair.

The site also says you must be over 18 and as swift as a coursing river, with all the force of a great typhoon to take part.

One Twitter user summed up what we're all thinking, writing: "So I'm thinking this job from Reviews.org to watch 30 Disney+ movies/shows in 30 days is something I already plan on doing. Therefore, I should apply."

You know what they say, do what you love and you'll never work a day in your life.
description: A reviews website wants to pay five of the biggest Disney fans to watch a film or TV show every day for 30 days
